name: lingarr
description: Lingarr is a self-hosted language learning and translation platform that helps users build vocabulary through spaced repetition and quizzes. It supports importing phrases and integrates with translation APIs.
features: Language Learning: Vocabulary building, Spaced repetition, Quiz system. Learn languages effectively.
Translation Integration: API support, Phrase import, Multi-language. Build your vocabulary database.
Self-Hosted: Privacy-focused, Custom content, Personal progress. Own your language learning data.
Spaced Repetition: SRS algorithm, Optimal review timing, Memory retention. Learn efficiently.
Quiz System: Multiple formats, Progress tracking, Difficulty adjustment. Test your knowledge.
Phrase Management: Import phrases, Context examples, Audio support. Build comprehensive vocabulary.
Progress Tracking: Learning statistics, Streak tracking, Achievement system. Monitor your improvement.
Multi-Language: Support for many languages, Parallel learning, Language pairs. Learn multiple languages.
